name: groups.kick
desc: This method allows a user to remove another member from a private channel.

channel.desc: Private channel to remove user from.

user.desc: User to remove from private channel.

errors.channel_not_found: Value passed for channel was invalid.
errors.user_not_found: Value passed for user was invalid.
errors.cant_kick_self: You can't remove yourself from a group.
errors.not_in_group: User or caller were are not in the group.
errors.restricted_action: A team preference prevents the authenticated user from kicking.
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
errors.user_is_bot: This method cannot be called by a bot user.
errors.user_is_restricted: This method cannot be called by a restricted user or single channel guest.
errors.invalid_array_arg: The method was passed an HTTP-style array argument, which is never valid with the Slack API.
errors.request_timeout: The method was called via a POST request, but the POST data was either missing or truncated.
